title: For an eventual Gangplank rework
body:
Hi, just a teaser idea that I wanted to share for a release of a new pirate or gangplank rework and here it is
Just having a pirate ship/Dead Pool, sailing and docking in the river top left of the summoner rift, (outside the playable area)
And that's it, (it could get more complicated but I kept it simple)

Thanks for clicking
